metadata.title: CVE-2017-2641 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In Moodle 2.x and 3.x, SQL injection can occur via user preferences.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2641` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1').
